headline: Forced COVID lockdowns may soon be coming back to America
author: Kevin Hughes
sentences:
Shanghai’s strict zero-COVID protocols are poorly managed
Shanghai’s strict zero-COVID protocols are so poorly managed that residents are unable to access basic necessities like food, medications and medical care, prompting widespread and spontaneous protests online and in real world.
